channel.title: Dragon Claws Special Hitting 4 Numbers Problem!
channel.description: So, I got my drag claws and there perfect except that when you spec they only hit 2 numbers, how do i fix it so its 4?

item.title: Dragon Claws Special Hitting 4 Numbers Problem!
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

here is my dclaw code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(2068); dclaws = 3; checkclaws(); specialAmount -= 50; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; usingSpecial = true; }
and under that:

//if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ //setAnimation(2068); //dclaws = 3; //checkclaws(); //specialAmount -= 50; //lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); //actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); //lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); //specOn = false; //usingSpecial = true; //}

then search if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] ==
and put:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ startAnimation(2068); int firstHit; int secondHit; int thirdHit; int fourthHit; firstHit = hitDiff; secondHit = firstHit/2; thirdHit = secondHit/2; fourthHit = secondHit/2; if (secondHit % 2 != 0) { fourthHit++; } usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; specOn = false; }

all in client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Claws Special Hitting 4 Numbers Problem!
